Super-Response

Total Mayo 0-2

endoMayo 0-1,

bleeding score 0
Response Total Mayo reduction > 50%  Reduction of endoMayo
Partial Response Total Mayo reduction > 30% No formal improvement, but slight improvement in overall assessment

Non-Response

 Total Mayo reduction < 30%  no improvement

Response definition Clinical criterion Endoscopic criterion
Super-Response CDAI < 150 SES-CD 0-4, 2 points reduction vs. week 0
Response CDAI reduction > 100  SES-CD reduction >50%
Partial Response CDAI reduction > 70 SES-CD reduction < 50%, but overall improvement

Non-Response

 CDAI reduction < 70 SES-CD reduction < 50% and no overall improvement
